Class Compass Platform

A comprehensive web-based educational platform built with Python Flask that helps students discover suitable classes based on their interests, goals, and availability. Features include advanced search and filtering, teacher management, student enrollment tracking, and payment integration.

Python Flask JavaScript Bootstrap SQL PostgreSQL REST APIs pytest Docker CI/CD
Visit Platform

Super Locker

A secure file and data protection application built with Dart. Super Locker provides advanced encryption and security features to protect sensitive information. The application demonstrates modern mobile development practices and security implementation using Flutter framework.

Dart Flutter Mobile Development Security Encryption

MIND_LIFT

A comprehensive mental health and wellness application developed in C#. MIND_LIFT focuses on providing tools and resources to support mental well-being, featuring interactive elements for mood tracking, wellness tips, and personalized experiences.

C# .NET Mental Health Wellness User Experience Desktop Application

Scientific Calculator API

A comprehensive scientific calculator API built with C# for advanced mathematical computations. This project provides RESTful endpoints for complex mathematical operations including trigonometric functions, logarithms, statistical calculations, and advanced algebraic operations.

C# .NET Web API REST Mathematics Testing Swagger

Kotlin NoteTaker

A modern note-taking application built with Kotlin for Android. This application features intuitive note management, search functionality, and organized categorization. The project showcases mobile development best practices and clean architecture patterns.

Kotlin Android Mobile Development SQLite Material Design MVVM

Subshade

A versatile shell-based utility tool designed for system administration and automation tasks. Subshade provides powerful command-line functionality for managing files, processes, and system configurations.

Shell Bash System Administration Automation Command Line Scripting

UnitConverter

A comprehensive unit conversion application developed in C#. This tool provides accurate conversions between various units including length, weight, temperature, area, and volume. Features an intuitive interface and precise calculation algorithms.

C# .NET Mathematics Utility Desktop Application

KML Calculator

A specialized calculator application built with Kotlin for handling KML (Keyhole Markup Language) calculations and geographical data processing. This tool demonstrates expertise in geospatial data handling and mobile application development.

Kotlin Android Geospatial KML Mobile Development Data Processing

Multiplatform App

A cross-platform application developed with Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM) technology. This project demonstrates the ability to create applications that run on both Android and iOS platforms while sharing business logic and maintaining native performance.
